title: HR Operations Manager
description:
About the role
We are seeking an HR Operations Manager to support our new IT consulting business. You will build and run core HR operations and hiring processes, partner with delivery leads, and keep candidates and clients informed.

Requirements
- 2+ years experience in US IT recruiting/operations
- Excellent spoken and written communication with US clients
- Comfortable multitasking in a fast-paced, early-stage environment
- Ability to manage end-to-end hiring operations (sourcing to onboarding)
- Hands-on with tools (ATS/spreadsheets), documentation, and follow-ups

Nice to have
- Experience coordinating with onsite/offshore teams
- Familiarity with basic compliance and HR documentation

Locations
- Hyderabad, India / Michigan, USA (hybrid/flexible)
